creditline: The Anne and Hadlai Hull Fund
description: two seated men; younger man on left wearing glasses, hat, Adidas t-shirt, pants and flip-flop shoes, holding a boom box on his lap; man on right holding a stringed instrument with a lozenge-shaped body on his lap, wearing matching garments (pants, long shirt, jacket) with brocade pattern and sandals; painted backdrop with buildings on a street
signed: on back in pencil: Sory Sanle 2017 / MALI DJELI, 1984/2017
title: Mali Djeli
